metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2023 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in actionscript/Jplayer.as in the Flash SWF component (jplayer.swf) in jPlayer before 2.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors, possibly related to incomplete blacklists, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-1942 and CVE-2013-2022.

criterions.comment: jplayer package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
